TextBody:
Hello Brian,

My name is Ian and I will be assisting you with your case.

From your description it appears that you need a custom report built. Are you looking for documentation on the report building, or do you need assistance creating it?

Unfortunately the support teams cannot help create custom reports, but if you do want assistance we can refer you to the professional services team and they can assist creating these reports but there is an additional cost for this.
Please let me know how you'd like to proceed and I can help you however I can.



Thank you,
Ian Ranstrom
Senior Technical Support Engineer
__________________ _________
Powerful Data Security Made Easy
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com

TextBody:
Hello Brian,

Here is the documentation on how to create a custom report.
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/StealthAUDIT_11.5/page/Content/StealthAUDIT/Chapters/09.Reporting/Creating_a_Report.htm

Here is the documentation on the data collectors. Under each collector you can see what data they collect and what database tables they are writing data to.
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/StealthAUDIT_11.5/page/Content/StealthAUDIT/Chapters/06.Data_Collectors/06.Data_Collectors.htm

Here is the documentation on the SQLViewCreation Utility that you can also use to combine data from two tables to get information you may need.
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/StealthAUDIT_11.5/page/Content/StealthAUDIT/Analysis_Modules/SQLViewCreation/SQLViewCreation_Analysis_Module.htm

If you have any more specific questions I may be able to help answer them so please let me know.

Thank you,
Ian Ranstrom
Senior Technical Support Engineer
__________________ _________
Powerful Data Security Made Easy
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com

Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #441214 -  - 00441214 - Assistance creating custom report    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NmvGW:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello Brian,

Thank you for your time and patience on this issue and I am glad that we were able to get your issue resolved for you. 
The following is a summary of the ticket for your records.

Issue:
Need a custom report that finds all files older than 10 years with the file extension .db.
The report should show the file path, last access date, created date, and file size.


Resolution:
Implementation engineer Devon Anderson was able to create the report needed and provide it.
